00011    FUNCTION: OS_shell()
00012     PURPOSE: Call operating system shell.
00013      SYNTAX: void OS_shell(void);
00014  DESRIPTION: Creates new window for the shell and creates a new
00015              shell, which can be left by 'exit'
00016     RETURNS: Nothing
00017     VERSION: 901107 V0.2
00018 --#-func-------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00019 void OS_shell()
00020 {
00021   WINDOW *OS_window;
00022 
00023   OS_window = wn_open(_NO_BORDER,0,0,_cursvar.cols,_cursvar.lines,
00024                       16*BLACK+WHITE,16*BLACK+WHITE);
00025   wn_clear(OS_window);
00026   v_cursoron();
00027   printf("Return to simulation program with 'exit' ...\n\n");
00028   system(getenv("COMSPEC"));
00029   OS_window = wn_close(OS_window);
00030 }
